original_text: And there were three sons of Zeruiah there, Joab, and Abishai, and Asahel: and Asahel was as light of foot as a wild roe.
korean_text: 그 곳에 스루야의 세 아들 요압과 아비새와 아사헬이 있었는데 아사헬의 발은 들노루 같이 빠르더라

sentences.original_text: And there were three sons of Zeruiah there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에 스루야의 아들 세 명이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and Asahel was as light of foot
